gov.usgs.locator

Class Pick

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.locator.Pick
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Pick>

    public class Pick
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Pick>
    Keep all the data for one pick together.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pick

        public Pick(Station station,
            java.lang.String chaCode,
            double arrivalTime,
            boolean use,
            java.lang.String phCode)
        Create the pick with just enough information to be useful.
        Parameters:
        station - Station ID
        latitude - Geographic latitude in degrees
        longitude - Longitude in degrees
        elevation - Elevation in kilometers
        arrivalTime - Arrival time in seconds since the epoch
        use - If true, the pick may be used in a a location
        phCode - Current locator or associator phase code

    • Method Detail

      • addIdAids

        public void addIdAids(java.lang.String dbID,
                      double quality,
                      java.lang.String obsCode,
                      AuthorType authType,
                      double affinity)
        Additional information to help in phase association or location.
        Parameters:
        dbID - Data base ID (convenience for Hydra)
        quality - Pick uncertainty in seconds (not currently used)
        obsCode - Original pick identification (associator or analyst)
        authority - Source of the original phase identification
        affinity - Higher numbers make it harder to re-identify the phase

      • updateTt

        public void updateTt(Hypocenter hypo)
        Recompute the travel time for this pick when the hypocenter is updated.
        Parameters:
        hypo - Hypocenter information

      • updateID

        public void updateID(java.lang.String phCode,
                     double weight)
        When the phase is re-identified, these parameters need to change.
        Parameters:
        phCode - Current phase code
        weight - Pick regression weight

      • dontUse

        public void dontUse()
        The used flag can only change from true to false.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Pick pick)
        Sort picks by arrival time.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Pick>
